3;카에데;11;봤지? 미모리 선배는 수행부의 부부장으로, 우리 밥은 물론 많은 걸 챙겨주고 있어!
#3;em;[반짝]
#3;hophop
DataList.TextJp: 見た見た？ミモリ先輩は修行部の副部長で、あたしたちの食事を始めとして、色んな面倒を見てくれてるの！
DataList.TextTh: เห็นไหม? ในฐานะที่รุ่นพี่มิโมริเป็นรองหัวหน้าชมรม #nเธอมักจะเตรียมอาหารให้พวกเราและคอยดูแลเรื่องอื่นๆ อีกด้วย!
DataList.TextTw: 看到了吧？三森學姐身為執行部的副部長，不僅會幫我們料理三餐，在其他方面也都很照顧我們！
DataList.TextEn: See that? Mimori is the vice president of the Inner Discipline Club. She takes care of many things for us, not just our meals!
DataList.TextDe: See that? Mimori is the vice president of the Inner Discipline Club. She takes care of many things for us, not just our meals!
DataList.TextFr: See that? Mimori is the vice president of the Inner Discipline Club. She takes care of many things for us, not just our meals!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;00;미모리 선배의 꿈은 멋진 요조숙녀! 그걸 위해 수행하고 있대!
DataList.TextJp: そんなミモリ先輩の夢は「素敵な大和撫子」、そして「綺麗なお嫁さん」になること！あたしと似てるようでまた違った夢なんだけど、そのために修行してるんだって！
DataList.TextTh: ความฝันของรุ่นพี่มิโมริก็คือการได้เป็นเลดี้ที่เพียบพร้อมยังไงล่ะ! เธอก็เลยตั้งใจฝึกฝนตัวเองอยู่!
DataList.TextTw: 三森學姊的夢想是成為美麗的窈窕淑女！而且聽說她正在為此修行！
DataList.TextEn: Mimori's dream is to become a fine and elegant lady! That's what she's training for!
DataList.TextDe: Mimori's dream is to become a fine and elegant lady! That's what she's training for!
DataList.TextFr: Mimori's dream is to become a fine and elegant lady! That's what she's training for!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;04;미모리 선배 또한 츠바키 선배에 지지 않을 만큼 멋진 레이디…….
DataList.TextJp: ミモリ先輩もまた、ツバキ先輩に負けないぐらい素敵なレディー……。
DataList.TextTh: ทั้งรุ่นพี่มิโมริและรุ่นพี่สึบากิก็เป็นเลดี้ที่เพียบพร้อมไม่แพ้กันเลย...
DataList.TextTw: 我要成為不輸給三森學姐或椿學姐的完美淑女……
DataList.TextEn: Mimori is no less of an elegant lady than Tsubaki...
DataList.TextDe: Mimori is no less of an elegant lady than Tsubaki...
DataList.TextFr: Mimori is no less of an elegant lady than Tsubaki...

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;04;나도 지고 있을 순 없어. 미모리 선배처럼 되려면, 미모리 선배와 같은 수행을 해야만…….
DataList.TextJp: 私も負けていられない。ミモリ先輩みたいになるために、ミモリ先輩と同じ修行もやらないと……！
DataList.TextTh: ฉันเองก็จะยอมแพ้ไม่ได้แล้ว ถ้าอยากเป็นให้ได้แบบรุ่นพี่มิโมริก็ต้องใช้วิธีฝึกฝนเดียวกัน...
DataList.TextTw: 我也不能輸，如果想要成為三森學姐的話，就必須和她做同樣的修行……
DataList.TextEn: So I can't fall behind! If I want to be like Mimori, I should be doing the same kinds of training as her...
DataList.TextDe: So I can't fall behind! If I want to be like Mimori, I should be doing the same kinds of training as her...
DataList.TextFr: So I can't fall behind! If I want to be like Mimori, I should be doing the same kinds of training as her...

DataList.TextJp: ……あっ！良いこと思いついた！
DataList.TextTh: อ๊ะ! คิดอะไรดีๆ ออกแล้วล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 啊！我想到一個好辦法了！

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;03;이게 미모리 선배가 만들고 있는 카레! 냄새, 짱이다!
#3;a
#3;em;[반짝]
DataList.TextJp: ミモリ先輩が作ってるカレー、良い匂い！
DataList.TextTh: นี่คือแกงกะหรี่ฝีมือรุ่นพี่มิโมริ! กลิ่นหอมสุดๆ ไปเลย!
DataList.TextTw: 這就是三森學姐正在煮的咖哩！聞起來超香的耶！
DataList.TextEn: Mmm... That's the smell of Mimori's famous curry! Yummy!
DataList.TextDe: Mmm... That's the smell of Mimori's famous curry! Yummy!
DataList.TextFr: Mmm... That's the smell of Mimori's famous curry! Yummy!

DataList.TextJp: ちょっとだけ味見を……ぺろっ。
DataList.TextTh: ก่อนอื่นก็ลองชิมสักคำนึง...ซู้ดดดด ง่ำๆๆ
DataList.TextTw: 讓我先用湯匙舀一口嚐嚐看……呼嚕嚕，嗯……
DataList.TextEn: Let me have just a bit... *slurps* *nom nom*
DataList.TextDe: Let me have just a bit... *slurps* *nom nom*
DataList.TextFr: Let me have just a bit... *slurps* *nom nom*

DataList.TextJp: っ！すごく美味しい！
DataList.TextTh: อร่อยเหาะไปเลย!!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;00;하지만 미모리 선배가 만들어준 요리를 받아먹기만 해서야, 선배처럼 될 수 없어!
DataList.TextJp: でも、ミモリ先輩が作ってくれた料理を食べてるだけじゃ、先輩みたいにはなれない……！
DataList.TextTh: แต่ว่าถ้าเอาแต่กินอาหารที่รุ่นพี่มิโมริทำให้อย่างเดียวก็จะเป็นเหมือนรุ่นพี่มิโมริไม่ได้หรอกนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 不過如果只是吃三森學姐做的料理，是沒辦法變得跟學姐一樣的！
DataList.TextEn: But I can't be like Mimori if I just keep on eating her cooking!
DataList.TextDe: But I can't be like Mimori if I just keep on eating her cooking!
DataList.TextFr: But I can't be like Mimori if I just keep on eating her cooking!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;00;그러니, 카메라 너머의 여러분! 잘 보고 있어!
DataList.TextJp: だから、画面の前のみんな！よく見てて！
DataList.TextTh: เพราะงั้นคุณผู้ชมทุกท่านคะ! คอยดูให้ดีนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 所以，鏡頭另一邊的各位！你們要好好看著喔！
DataList.TextEn: So, watch me carefully, dear viewer!
DataList.TextDe: So, watch me carefully, dear viewer!
DataList.TextFr: So, watch me carefully, dear viewer!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;03;나도 미모리 선배처럼 되기 위해, 카레에 어레인지를 가하는 거야!
DataList.TextJp: ミモリ先輩みたいになるために……あたしはここから、さらにカレーにアレンジを加えて美味しくしてみせる！
DataList.TextTh: เพื่อการเป็นเลดี้แบบรุ่นพี่มิโมริ จากนี้ฉันจะลองเตรียมแกงกะหรี่ค่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 為了成為像三森學姐那樣的人，我要來挑戰改造咖哩！
DataList.TextEn: I think I'll doctor the curry myself to be just like Mimori!
DataList.TextDe: I think I'll doctor the curry myself to be just like Mimori!
DataList.TextFr: I think I'll doctor the curry myself to be just like Mimori!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;11;지금도 맛있는 카레지만, 내 힘으로 더욱 맛있게 만들면……!
#3;em;[하트]
#3;hophop
DataList.TextJp: 今のままでもすっごく美味しいけど、あたしの力でもっと美味しくできたら……！
DataList.TextTh: แกงกะหรี่ตอนนี้ก็อร่อยดีอยู่แล้ว แต่ว่าถ้าเป็นแกงกะหรี่ที่ทำเองล่ะก็ต้องยิ่งอร่อย...!
DataList.TextTw: 雖然這樣的咖哩也很好吃，但如果我能讓它變得更好吃的話……！
DataList.TextEn: The curry already tastes amazing, but if I can make it even better with my own cooking skills somehow...
DataList.TextDe: The curry already tastes amazing, but if I can make it even better with my own cooking skills somehow...
DataList.TextFr: The curry already tastes amazing, but if I can make it even better with my own cooking skills somehow...

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;미모리;09;카에데 쨩! 굉장해요! 제 카레가 200%나 더 맛있어 질 줄이야! 
#1;a
#1;em;[반짝]
#1;hophop
DataList.TextJp: カエデちゃん、すごいです！私だけで作った時より、さらに美味しくなりました！
DataList.TextTh: คาเอเดะจัง! สุดยอดเลยค่ะ! แกงกะหรี่ของฉันอร่อยขึ้นอีก 200 เปอร์เซ็นต์เลย!
DataList.TextTw: 楓。太厲害了！沒想到我的咖哩好吃度增加了200%！
DataList.TextEn: Kaede! This is brilliant! I can't believe you made my curry twice as delicious!
DataList.TextDe: Kaede! This is brilliant! I can't believe you made my curry twice as delicious!
DataList.TextFr: Kaede! This is brilliant! I can't believe you made my curry twice as delicious!

DataList.TextJp: すごいね～。カエデ、おかわりー。
DataList.TextTh: คาเอเดะ เก่งสุดยอด... ขออีกจาน...
DataList.TextTw: 楓—你好厲害，再給我一碗飯—
DataList.TextEn: You're amazing, Kaede! I'm going to have seconds...
DataList.TextDe: You're amazing, Kaede! I'm going to have seconds...
DataList.TextFr: You're amazing, Kaede! I'm going to have seconds...

DataList.TextJp: えへっ、えへへへっ……！
DataList.TextTh: ฮุฮิ ฮิฮิฮิฮิ

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;카에데;00;음, 내가 보기에 카레는 무척 맛있지만. 약간 단 맛이 부족한 거 같아!
DataList.TextJp: うん、そうだなー……美味しいけど、ちょっとだけ甘さが足りないような気がする！
DataList.TextTh: อืม จากที่เห็นฉันคิดว่าแกงกะหรี่อร่อยมากๆ แล้วก็จริง แต่เหมือนจะขาดรสหวานอยู่นิดหน่อย!
DataList.TextTw: 嗯，雖然我覺得這樣的咖哩已經很好吃了，不過甜味好像還是有點不夠！
DataList.TextEn: Mmm, this curry tastes pretty great, but I think it could be a touch sweeter...
DataList.TextDe: Mmm, this curry tastes pretty great, but I think it could be a touch sweeter...
DataList.TextFr: Mmm, this curry tastes pretty great, but I think it could be a touch sweeter...

DataList.TextJp: じゃあ砂糖を少し入れて……
DataList.TextTh: เพราะงั้นฉันจะเติมน้ำตาลลงไป...
DataList.TextEn: So, I'll just add some sugar...
DataList.TextDe: So, I'll just add some sugar...
DataList.TextFr: So, I'll just add some sugar...

DataList.TextJp: うわわっ、蓋が！？すんごい量入っちゃった！？
DataList.TextTh: อ๊ะ ฝาขวดโหลน้ำตาลมัน...?! น้ำตาลหกลงไปหมดเลย!
DataList.TextTw: 啊，砂糖的蓋子？！我加太多了！
DataList.TextEn: Oh no, the lid fell off! I put in way too much sugar!
DataList.TextDe: Oh no, the lid fell off! I put in way too much sugar!
DataList.TextFr: Oh no, the lid fell off! I put in way too much sugar!

DataList.TextJp: ど、どうしよう……！
DataList.TextTh: ทะ...ทำยังไงดี!

DataList.TextJp: あっ！
DataList.TextTh: อ๊ะ!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;03;단맛을 중화시키려면……. 짠맛을 더 넣으면 될 거야! 
#3;hophop
DataList.TextJp: 甘さを中和するためには……塩！
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าจะกลบรสหวานล่ะก็... ต้องเติมรสเค็มลงไปไงล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 想要中和甜味的話……只要再加點鹹味就行了！
DataList.TextEn: Okay! Well, if I wanna tone down some of this sweetness... I guess should make it saltier!
DataList.TextDe: Okay! Well, if I wanna tone down some of this sweetness... I guess should make it saltier!
DataList.TextFr: Okay! Well, if I wanna tone down some of this sweetness... I guess should make it saltier!

DataList.TextJp: カードゲームでも、ダメージはこうやって相殺されて計算されるもの！
DataList.TextTh: ปกติเวลาเล่นการ์ดเกม ถ้าเจอดาเมจหนักๆ ก็ต้องเพิ่มค่าป้องกันเพื่อหักล้างกัน!
DataList.TextTw: 畢竟在一般的卡牌遊戲中，傷害都可以相抵嘛！
DataList.TextEn: I mean, that's how you offset damage in most card games, right?
DataList.TextDe: I mean, that's how you offset damage in most card games, right?
DataList.TextFr: I mean, that's how you offset damage in most card games, right?

DataList.TextJp: ちょっとだけ塩を入れて……！
DataList.TextTh: ถ้างั้นก็ใส่เกลือลงไปนิดหน่อย...!

DataList.TextJp: うん！よし、OK！
DataList.TextTh: อื้อ! ใช้ได้! อร่อยเหาะ!
DataList.TextEn: Yup! That's perfect! I feel like I accomplished something today!
DataList.TextDe: Yup! That's perfect! I feel like I accomplished something today!
DataList.TextFr: Yup! That's perfect! I feel like I accomplished something today!

DataList.TextJp: これでミモリ先輩を見習った修行もできた！
DataList.TextTh: ขอจบการฝึกฝนแบบรุ่นพี่มิโมริเพียงเท่านี้!
DataList.TextTw: 這樣我就完成和三森學姐一樣的修行了！
DataList.TextEn: And that concludes my Mimori training!
DataList.TextDe: And that concludes my Mimori training!
DataList.TextFr: And that concludes my Mimori training!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;03;그렇게 해서, 홍보 영상! 전부 찍었어! 선생님!
#3;a
#3;em;[반짝]
DataList.TextJp: っていう感じで、紹介動画が完成したよ！先生！
DataList.TextTh: เพราะงั้น... วิดีโอโปรโมตก็ถ่ายเสร็จแล้วล่ะ! คุณครู!
DataList.TextTw: 因此，宣傳影片！我全都拍好了！老師！
DataList.TextEn: There, I finished it, Sensei! The promo video is done!
DataList.TextDe: There, I finished it, Sensei! The promo video is done!
DataList.TextFr: There, I finished it, Sensei! The promo video is done!

DataList.TextJp: ここに、修行部の全てが詰まってる！
DataList.TextTh: ในวิดีโอนี้มีหัวใจสำคัญของชมรมเราอยู่ทั้งหมดแล้ว!
DataList.TextTw: 這裡面紀錄了滿滿的執行部日常精華！
DataList.TextEn: The entirety of the Inner Discipline Club, its very essence, is captured here!
DataList.TextDe: The entirety of the Inner Discipline Club, its very essence, is captured here!
DataList.TextFr: The entirety of the Inner Discipline Club, its very essence, is captured here!

DataList.TextTh: [s] "อย่างนั้นเหรอ?"

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;11;이것만 투고하면 수행부의 우승도 확실…… 확정! 멋진 레이디 데뷔야!
#3;hophop
DataList.TextJp: これを出せばコンテストでの優勝も確実！もしかしたらキヴォトス中に知れ渡って……素敵なレディーとして一気に知名度がすごいことに！？
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าใช้วิดีโออันนี้ ฉันแน่ใจว่าชัยชนะต้องเป็นของชมรมฝึกฝน... แน่นอน! #nการเปิดตัวของเลดี้ผู้เพียบพร้อมยังไงล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 只要用這個來投稿，那麼優勝就是我們執行部的……囊中之物了！然後我就能成為完美淑女了！
DataList.TextEn: Once I submit this, the Inner Discipline Club's victory is likely...no, it's guaranteed! This will mark my debut as a true lady!
DataList.TextDe: Once I submit this, the Inner Discipline Club's victory is likely...no, it's guaranteed! This will mark my debut as a true lady!
DataList.TextFr: Once I submit this, the Inner Discipline Club's victory is likely...no, it's guaranteed! This will mark my debut as a true lady!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;10;헉?! 하지만 이걸 공개했다가 엄청난 인기를 끈 나머지…….
#3;em;[!]
DataList.TextJp: あっ、ってことはこれを公開したら、人気が急上昇しちゃって……
DataList.TextTh: อ๊ะ?! ถ้าเกิดโพสต์วิดีโอนี่ไปแล้วชมรมเราเกิดดังขึ้นมาล่ะก็...
DataList.TextTw: 天啊？！不過只要等到這支影片公開，並且獲得廣大的迴響……
DataList.TextEn: *gasps* But what if the video goes viral after the reveal...
DataList.TextDe: *gasps* But what if the video goes viral after the reveal...
DataList.TextFr: *gasps* But what if the video goes viral after the reveal...

DataList.TextJp: それで、すんごい数の入部希望者が殺到したらどうしよう！？
DataList.TextTh: ถ้ามีคนแห่มาสมัครเข้าชมรมเราเยอะแยะจะทำยังไงล่ะ?!
DataList.TextTw: 要是有一大堆想要加入我們社團的人跑過來該怎麼辦呢？！
DataList.TextEn: and we get a tidal wave of new people hoping to join the club?!
DataList.TextDe: and we get a tidal wave of new people hoping to join the club?!
DataList.TextFr: and we get a tidal wave of new people hoping to join the club?!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;카에데;07;으으음……! 그럼 어쩔 수 없네! 결정! 그 후배들을 직접 이끌어주는 멋진 레이디 선배가 될 수밖에! 이히힛!
#3;em;[///]
#3;stiff
DataList.TextJp: うーん……！でもそれは仕方ないね！うん、後輩たちを率いる素敵な「先輩」のレディーになるしかない！えへっ！
DataList.TextTh: อื้อออ...! แบบนั้นก็คงช่วยไม่ได้นะ เอาล่ะ! ฉันก็คงจะต้องทำตัวให้สมกับเป็นรุ่นพี่ #nเลดี้ผู้เพียบพร้อมให้พวกรุ่นน้องได้เห็นสินะ! ฮิฮิฮิ
DataList.TextTw: 嗯……！那就沒辦法了！決定了！看來我得成為能夠帶領那些學妹前進的完美淑女學姐了！嘻嘻嘻！
DataList.TextEn: Hmm... No matter! It's already decided! I have no choice but to take on the role of an elegant lady and guide the young new recruits! Hehehe!
DataList.TextDe: Hmm... No matter! It's already decided! I have no choice but to take on the role of an elegant lady and guide the young new recruits! Hehehe!
DataList.TextFr: Hmm... No matter! It's already decided! I have no choice but to take on the role of an elegant lady and guide the young new recruits! Hehehe!

DataList.TextJp:
[s1] "前向きなのは良いんだけど……。"
[s2] "たまには後ろも見た方が良いかも。"
DataList.TextTh:
[s1] "ดีทุกอย่างเลยนะ"
[s2] “ข้างหลัง คาเอเดะ...”
DataList.TextEn:
[s1] "That all sounds great,"
[s2] "but Kaede, look behind you."
DataList.TextDe:
[s1] "That all sounds great,"
[s2] "but Kaede, look behind you."
DataList.TextFr:
[s1] "That all sounds great,"
[s2] "but Kaede, look behind you."

DataList.TextJp: え、後ろ？何で？
DataList.TextTh: หือ? ข้างหลัง ทำไมเหรอคะ?

DataList.TextJp: え、後ろ？何で？
DataList.TextTh: หือ? ข้างหลัง ทำไมเหรอคะ?

DataList.TextJp: 猫……犬……ペロペロ地獄……。
DataList.TextTh: (งึมงำ) น้องแมว... น้องหมา... ห่วงโซ่แห่งนรก...
DataList.TextTw: （濕濕黏黏不舒服）貓咪……小狗……永無止境的舔舔地獄……
DataList.TextEn: *licking* *slurping* *lap* Cats... Puppies... I feel like I've been in some sort of licking hell...
DataList.TextDe: *licking* *slurping* *lap* Cats... Puppies... I feel like I've been in some sort of licking hell...
DataList.TextFr: *licking* *slurping* *lap* Cats... Puppies... I feel like I've been in some sort of licking hell...

DataList.TextJp: カエデ～……？
DataList.TextTh: คา~ เอ~ เดะ~~~

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미모리;08;카에데 쨩. 동아리실 부엌의 카레에 손을 댄 거, 카에데 쨩이죠?
#2;m1
#3;m3
#5;em;[반응]
#5;h
DataList.TextJp: 部室のキッチンにあったカレーに手を加えたの、カエデちゃんですよね？
DataList.TextTh: คาเอเดะจัง คนที่เข้ามาวุ่นวายกับแกงกะหรี่ในครัวห้องชมรมคือคาเอเดะจังใช่ไหมคะ?
DataList.TextTw: 楓。是誰碰了社辦廚房的咖哩，是楓吧？
DataList.TextEn: Kaede, are you the one who touched the curry in our club room kitchen?
DataList.TextDe: Kaede, are you the one who touched the curry in our club room kitchen?
DataList.TextFr: Kaede, are you the one who touched the curry in our club room kitchen?

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미모리;09;자, 여기 앉아요. 저, 약간 진심으로 화났으니까요.
#5;greeting
#5;em;[반짝]
#5;h
DataList.TextJp: ここに座ってください。私、今回はちょっと本気で怒ってますからね。
DataList.TextTh: มานั่งตรงนี้หน่อยค่ะ ฉันโกรธจริงๆ นะคะ
DataList.TextTw: 好，坐這裡吧。我真的有點生氣了。
DataList.TextEn: Come over here and take a seat. It goes without saying that I'm a little mad...
DataList.TextDe: Come over here and take a seat. It goes without saying that I'm a little mad...
DataList.TextFr: Come over here and take a seat. It goes without saying that I'm a little mad...

DataList.ScriptKr:
2;츠바키;03
5;미모리;09
3;카에데;10;저, 저건 츠바키 선배와 미모리 선배가 진짜 화났을 때 짓는 표정!
#3;em;[?!]
#3;shake
DataList.TextJp: つ、ツバキ先輩とミモリ先輩が、本当に怒った時の顔してる！？
DataList.TextTh: นะ...นี่มันสีหน้าที่โกรธจัดของรุ่นพี่มิโมริและรุ่นพี่สึบากิ!
DataList.TextTw: 那、那是椿學姐和三森學姐真的發火時才會露出的表情！
DataList.TextEn: Uh-oh! That's the face that Tsubaki and Mimori make when they're really mad!
DataList.TextDe: Uh-oh! That's the face that Tsubaki and Mimori make when they're really mad!
DataList.TextFr: Uh-oh! That's the face that Tsubaki and Mimori make when they're really mad!

DataList.TextJp: こ、このままだと「鬼の説教地獄〜5時間のフルコース〜」待ったなし！
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าเป็นแบบนี้ล่ะก็ต่อไปคงจะเป็น... การเทศนานรกสุดโหดแบบฟูลคอร์สห้าชั่วโมงเต็ม....!
DataList.TextTw: 要是不想個辦法的話，我就得面對五個小時的地獄說教時間……！
DataList.TextEn: At this rate, I'm in for a difficult five-hour lecture!
DataList.TextDe: At this rate, I'm in for a difficult five-hour lecture!
DataList.TextFr: At this rate, I'm in for a difficult five-hour lecture!

DataList.TextJp: ひぃんっ！先生助けて～！
DataList.TextTh: ฮือ...~ ชะ...ช่วยด้วย คุณครู~!

DataList.TextJp: [s] "自業自得。"
DataList.TextTh: [s] "กรรมใดใครก่อกรรมนั้นย่อมคืนสนอง..."

DataList.TextJp: う、うわあぁぁ～ん！！
DataList.TextTh: อะ... อ๊ายยย~!

DataList.TextJp: （修行部の先輩たちによる説教地獄は、それからだいぶ長いこと続いた……）
DataList.TextTh: (การเทศนานรกสุดโหดของชมรมฝึกฝนได้เริ่มขึ้น)
DataList.TextTw: （執行部的說教地獄就此展開。）
DataList.TextEn: (So begins the five hour lecture of the Inner Discipline Club.)
DataList.TextDe: (So begins the five hour lecture of the Inner Discipline Club.)
DataList.TextFr: (So begins the five hour lecture of the Inner Discipline Club.)

DataList.TextJp: 修行部の紹介動画を撮ろう！
DataList.TextTh: มาถ่ายวิดีโอโปรโมตชมรมฝึกฝนกันเถอะ!
DataList.TextEn: Filming an Inner Discipline Club Promo!
DataList.TextDe: Filming an Inner Discipline Club Promo!
DataList.TextFr: Filming an Inner Discipline Club Promo!

DataList.TextJp: ゲームの道はマナーから（１）
DataList.TextTh: มารยาทที่ดีจะช่วยสร้างสรรค์เกม 1

DataList.TextJp: ミレニアム・ゲーム開発部
DataList.TextTh: ชมรมพัฒนาเกม มิลเลเนียม

DataList.TextJp: んっ、くっ……んぅっ……！
DataList.TextTh: อะ.... อื้ออออ...!

DataList.TextJp: 何してるの、お姉ちゃん？
DataList.TextTh: ทำอะไรอยู่เหรอคะพี่?
DataList.TextEn: What are you up to, Sis?
DataList.TextDe: What are you up to, Sis?
DataList.TextFr: What are you up to, Sis?

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;05;방해하지 마, 미도리! 지금 중요한 순간이란 말이야!
#3;em;[?!]
#3;hophop
DataList.TextJp: ちょっと待って！今大事なとこだから！
DataList.TextTh: อย่ามากวนน่า มิโดริ! ตอนนี้กำลังเป็นเวลาสำคัญนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 不要妨礙我，綠！現在可是關鍵時刻！
DataList.TextEn: Don't distract me, Midori! This is a critical moment!
DataList.TextDe: Don't distract me, Midori! This is a critical moment!
DataList.TextFr: Don't distract me, Midori! This is a critical moment!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;05;한 대만. 한 대만 더 때리면 승리가 눈 앞에……!
DataList.TextJp: あと一発、あと一発当たれば、勝て、るっ……！
DataList.TextTh: อีกนิดเดียว...  ถ้าล้มอีกเครื่องนึงได้ก็จะชนะแล้ว...!
DataList.TextTw: 只剩一台。只要再打倒一台，勝利就在眼前了…！
DataList.TextEn: One more hit... Just one more hit and I'll be victorious!
DataList.TextDe: One more hit... Just one more hit and I'll be victorious!
DataList.TextFr: One more hit... Just one more hit and I'll be victorious!

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;미도리;03;아, <스튜던트 파이터 2> 하고 있구나. 요새 열심히 플레이하네.
#1;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: あ、『スチューデントファイター2』？最近よくやってるね。
DataList.TextTh: อ๋อ เล่นเกม <สติวเดนท์ ไฟเตอร์ 2> อยู่นี่เอง ช่วงนี้ตั้งใจเล่นน่าดูเลยนะ
DataList.TextTw: 啊，你在玩<慢打炫風2>啊。最近玩得很認真呢。
DataList.TextEn: Oh, Student Fighter 2! You've been playing this game a lot lately, huh?
DataList.TextDe: Oh, Student Fighter 2! You've been playing this game a lot lately, huh?
DataList.TextFr: Oh, Student Fighter 2! You've been playing this game a lot lately, huh?

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;00;응, 요번에 온라인 매치 기능이 추가되어서 게임센터의 유저들과 실시간 대전이 가능해졌거든.
DataList.TextJp: そう、この間オンライン機能が、追加され……てっ！ゲーセンのユーザーとも、オンライン対戦が、できるように……！
DataList.TextTh: ใช่ รอบนี้มีฟังก์ชั่นจับคู่ออนไลน์เพิ่มเข้ามา เลยทำให้แข่งกับเกมเมอร์คนอื่นที่เกมเซนเตอร์ #nได้แบบเรียลไทม์ยังไงล่ะ
DataList.TextTw: 嗯，這次新增了線上配對功能，可以與遊戲中心的用戶進行即時對戰。
DataList.TextEn: Yup, they just added online matchmaking in the last update. Now I can play in real-time with people at the game center!
DataList.TextDe: Yup, they just added online matchmaking in the last update. Now I can play in real-time with people at the game center!
DataList.TextFr: Yup, they just added online matchmaking in the last update. Now I can play in real-time with people at the game center!

DataList.TextJp: 今までは割とっ、余裕だったん、だけど……！
DataList.TextTh: ที่ผ่านมามีแต่คู่ต่อสู้ที่น่าเบื่อทั้งนั้น...
DataList.TextTw: 原本都只遇到不成氣候的對手，覺得很無聊…
DataList.TextEn: I was starting to get bored because I was only finding easy opponents...
DataList.TextDe: I was starting to get bored because I was only finding easy opponents...
DataList.TextFr: I was starting to get bored because I was only finding easy opponents...

DataList.TextJp: 久しぶりに強い人、がっ……！
DataList.TextTh: นานๆ จะเจอคนที่มีฝีมือดีๆ สักที
DataList.TextTw: 久違地遇到了不錯的對手。
DataList.TextEn: but after a while, I finally ran into a worthy challenger!
DataList.TextDe: but after a while, I finally ran into a worthy challenger!
DataList.TextFr: but after a while, I finally ran into a worthy challenger!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;00;좋았어, 구석에 몰아붙였어! 이제 잡기 기술로 적의 가드를 무효화시키면—
#3;hophop
#3;em;[!]
#3;a
DataList.TextJp: 追い詰めた！ガードされても掴み技で――
DataList.TextTh: เยี่ยม ต้อนมันไปจนมุมได้แล้ว! คราวนี้ถ้าใช้สกิลจัดการรวบผู้คุ้มกันของฝ่ายโน้นได้ล่ะก็...
DataList.TextTw: 很好，把對方逼到死角了！現在用投擲技使敵方的防禦無效的話—
DataList.TextEn: Good, I got 'em cornered! Now I just have to use a command grab to cancel their guard...
DataList.TextDe: Good, I got 'em cornered! Now I just have to use a command grab to cancel their guard...
DataList.TextFr: Good, I got 'em cornered! Now I just have to use a command grab to cancel their guard...

DataList.TextJp: なっ、ここで回避！？からのアッパーカット！？
DataList.TextTh: เดี๋ยวสิ? เมื่อกี้นี้ผู้คุ้มกันมันหลบหมัดฉันแล้วสวนอัปเปอร์คัทกลับมางั้นเหรอ?!
DataList.TextTw: 咦？在這裡迴避防禦後使出上勾拳？！
DataList.TextEn: What the heck? They did a guard evasion into an uppercut?!
DataList.TextDe: What the heck? They did a guard evasion into an uppercut?!
DataList.TextFr: What the heck? They did a guard evasion into an uppercut?!

DataList.TextJp: ちょっ、立て続けに連続コンボって……そこで必殺技ぁ！？
DataList.TextTh: แถมพอใช้คอมโบต่อเนื่องแล้วยัง...ใช้ท่าไม้ตายด้วย?!
DataList.TextTw: 那之後接連使出連擊…還用了必殺技？！
DataList.TextEn: Followed by a big combo...and a finisher too?!
DataList.TextDe: Followed by a big combo...and a finisher too?!
DataList.TextFr: Followed by a big combo...and a finisher too?!

DataList.TextJp: <SYSTEM> 「Peach_Figther」選手の負け！
DataList.TextTh: <ข้อความระบบ> ผู้เล่น 'Peach_Fighter' พ่ายแพ้!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;06;으앙, 이게 뭐야! 마지막의 실수로 순식간에 역전당했잖아!
#3;em;[속상함]
#3;stiff
DataList.TextJp: うわぁんっ！最後の判断ミスで逆転されたぁっ！？
DataList.TextTh: อ๊า! อะไรกันเนี่ย! แค่พลาดไปนิดเดียวผลก็พลิกล็อกเลยเหรอ!
DataList.TextTw: 呃啊，搞什麼！因為最後的失誤，瞬間被逆轉了！
DataList.TextEn: What, seriously?! I made one tiny mistake at the end and I got the tables turned on me!
DataList.TextDe: What, seriously?! I made one tiny mistake at the end and I got the tables turned on me!
DataList.TextFr: What, seriously?! I made one tiny mistake at the end and I got the tables turned on me!

DataList.TextJp: 惜しかったね、本当にもう少しだったのに……。
DataList.TextTh: น่าเสียดายจัง ช้าไปแค่ก้าวเดียวเอง...
DataList.TextTw: 好可惜。真的只有毫釐之差…
DataList.TextEn: So close. It was by a whisker!
DataList.TextDe: So close. It was by a whisker!
DataList.TextFr: So close. It was by a whisker!

DataList.TextJp: うん……まあ仕方ない、勝負は勝負。
DataList.TextTh: แต่ก็ช่วยไม่ได้ล่ะนะ แพ้ก็คือแพ้ ชนะก็คือชนะ
DataList.TextTw: 但也沒有辦法。比賽就是比賽。
DataList.TextEn: Nothing you can do about it, though. A match is a match.
DataList.TextDe: Nothing you can do about it, though. A match is a match.
DataList.TextFr: Nothing you can do about it, though. A match is a match.

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;01;우선은 좋은 경기를 보여준 상대에게 감사의 메시지라도 남길까.
#3;m3
#1;dl
DataList.TextJp: 良い試合だったし、相手にメッセでも送っとこ。
DataList.TextTh: ฉันควรส่งข้อความไปขอบคุณอีกฝ่ายที่ตั้งใจเล่นดีไหมนะ?
DataList.TextTw: 先來傳個訊息給對方，謝謝他跟我打了一場精彩的對戰吧。
DataList.TextEn: I should send them a thank-you message for that good game...
DataList.TextDe: I should send them a thank-you message for that good game...
DataList.TextFr: I should send them a thank-you message for that good game...

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;01;<Peach_Figther : 좋은 승부였어, Sukeban312. 다음에 기회가 되면 또 승부하자.>
DataList.TextJp: ＜Peach_Figther：Sukeban312さん対戦ありがとう！良い勝負だったね、今度また機会があったらやろう！＞
DataList.TextTh: <Peach_Fighter: เป็นการแข่งขันที่ดีมากเลยนะ Sukebun312 ถ้ามีโอกาสไว้มาแข่งกันใหม่นะ>
DataList.TextTw: <Peach_Figther：這場對戰很精彩，Sukeban312。下次有機會的話再來一場吧。>
DataList.TextEn: "Peach_Fighter: Good game, Sukeban312. Let's have a rematch sometime!"
DataList.TextDe: "Peach_Fighter: Good game, Sukeban312. Let's have a rematch sometime!"
DataList.TextFr: "Peach_Fighter: Good game, Sukeban312. Let's have a rematch sometime!"

DataList.ScriptKr: #na;<Sukeban312 : ㅋㅋㅋ 허접 ㅋㅋㅋ 엄마 젖이나 더 먹고 와라>
DataList.TextJp: ＜Sukeban312：出直せ下手くそ＞
DataList.TextTh: <Sukebun312: คิคิคิคิ แย่จัง กลับไปซบอกแม่แล้วค่อยมาใหม่แล้วกันไป๊ เด็กน้อย>
DataList.TextTw: <Sukeban312：顆顆顆 小嫩嫩 顆顆顆 先去找媽媽喝完奶再來>

DataList.TextJp: ちょっ、はぁ！？何それ！？
DataList.TextTh: วะ... ว่าไงนะ?! เกินไปแล้วนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 你、你說什麼？這話說得太過分了！

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;05;<Peach_Figther : 잠깐, 그 말투는 뭐야? 유치한 어린애도 아니고!>
DataList.TextJp: ＜Peach_Figther：ねえその言い方は無いでしょ！？子供じゃないんだし！＞
DataList.TextTh: <Peach_Figther: เดี๋ยวก่อน ทำไมพูดแบบนั้นล่ะ ไม่ใช่เด็กแล้วสักหน่อย!>
DataList.TextTw: <Peach_Figther：等等，你的語氣是怎樣？又不是什麼屁孩！>
DataList.TextEn: "Peach_Fighter: Come on, what's with that attitude? You're acting like a child!"
DataList.TextDe: "Peach_Fighter: Come on, what's with that attitude? You're acting like a child!"
DataList.TextFr: "Peach_Fighter: Come on, what's with that attitude? You're acting like a child!"

DataList.ScriptKr: #na;<Sukeban312 : 어린애는 그쪽이겠지. 아니, 조작 속도가 느릿느릿한 게 어린애가 아니라 할머니인가?>
DataList.TextJp: ＜Sukeban312：子供はそっちでしょ。いや、操作も反応も遅かったし、子供っていうよりもしかしておばあちゃん？＞
DataList.TextTh: <Sukeban312: คนที่เด็กน่ะมันเธอต่างหาก ดูจากการเล่นเนิ่บๆ แบบนี้ #nถ้าไม่ใช่เด็กก็คงเป็นยายแก่ๆ แล้วล่ะมั้ง?>
DataList.TextTw: <Sukeban312：你才是小孩吧。不對，操作速度這麼慢，我看你不是小孩，是老奶奶才對？>
DataList.TextEn: Sukeban312: You're the child here, not me. Actually, seeing how slow your moves were, should I be calling you "Granny" instead?
DataList.TextDe: Sukeban312: You're the child here, not me. Actually, seeing how slow your moves were, should I be calling you "Granny" instead?
DataList.TextFr: Sukeban312: You're the child here, not me. Actually, seeing how slow your moves were, should I be calling you "Granny" instead?

DataList.TextJp: お、おばあちゃん……！？
DataList.TextTh: ยายแก่งั้นเร๊อะ....!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;05;<Peach_Figther : 그러는 너도 나한테 거의 질 뻔 했잖아!>
DataList.TextJp: ＜Peach_Figther：そんなこと言って、そっちだってギリギリだったじゃん！＞
DataList.TextTh: <Peach_Figther: แต่ว่าเธอเองก็เกือบแพ้ให้ฉันแล้วเหมือนกันนะ!>

DataList.ScriptKr: #na;<Sukeban312 : 응? 어디서 누가 울고 있나? 패배자의 목소리는 안 들리는데~.>
DataList.TextJp: ＜Sukeban312：顔真っ赤。ほら、涙拭けよ。にしても負け犬ほどよく吠えるってほんとだな＞
DataList.TextTh: <Sukeban312: หือ? เหมือนได้ยินใครร้องไห้งอแงอยู่เลยนะ? #nเสียงโวยวายของคนแพ้นี่ไม่น่าฟังเลย~>
DataList.TextTw: <Sukeban312：嗯？有誰在哭嗎？不愧是輸家，連哭聲也這麼虛呢～>
DataList.TextEn: Sukeban312: Is someone crying? Sorry, I don't speak loser!
DataList.TextDe: Sukeban312: Is someone crying? Sorry, I don't speak loser!
DataList.TextFr: Sukeban312: Is someone crying? Sorry, I don't speak loser!

DataList.TextJp: こんのっ……そっちどこ住み！？住所教えて！こうなったら真っ正面から――
DataList.TextTh: นี่! เธออยู่ที่ไหนน่ะ บอกที่อยู่มาเลยนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 喂！你住哪裡！告訴我地址！
DataList.TextEn: Ugh! ...Where do you live?! Give me your address right now!
DataList.TextDe: Ugh! ...Where do you live?! Give me your address right now!
DataList.TextFr: Ugh! ...Where do you live?! Give me your address right now!

DataList.TextJp: <SYSTEM> 対戦相手があなたのことをブロックしました。
DataList.TextTh: <ข้อความระบบ> ฝ่ายตรงข้ามได้ทำการบล็อกท่านแล้ว

DataList.TextJp: うわー、これはひどい……。
DataList.TextTh: เฮ้อ... แบบนี้มันทำเกินไปแล้วนะ

DataList.TextJp: ……なっ、
DataList.TextTh: อะไรกัน....

DataList.TextJp: 何てマナーのなってないやつ！！！
DataList.TextTh: อะไรกันเนี่ย เกมเมอร์นิสัยเสียคนนี้เนี่ย!
DataList.TextTw: 什麼東西，你這沒禮貌的玩家！
DataList.TextEn: What the heck is with this toxic player?!
DataList.TextDe: What the heck is with this toxic player?!
DataList.TextFr: What the heck is with this toxic player?!

DataList.TextJp: というわけで……
DataList.TextTh: เพราะมีเรื่องแบบนี้....

DataList.TextJp: 今からリアルファイトに行くよ！
DataList.TextTh: ตอนนี้ก็ไป "เรียล PK" กันเถอะ!
DataList.TextEn: We're going on a real-life hunt!
DataList.TextDe: We're going on a real-life hunt!
DataList.TextFr: We're going on a real-life hunt!

DataList.TextJp: えぇ……というか、わ、わたしも……？
DataList.TextTh: พะ...พวกเราด้วยเหรอ?

DataList.TextJp: ……私も、ですか？
DataList.TextTh: ...พวกเราต้องไปด้วยเหรอคะ?
DataList.TextEn: You want us to come with you?
DataList.TextDe: You want us to come with you?
DataList.TextFr: You want us to come with you?

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;05;물론이지! 현실 PK에서 중요한 건 무엇보다 기선 제압이라고!
#3;em;[!]
#3;hophop
#2;hide
#4;hide
DataList.TextJp: もっちろん！まあリアルファイトっていうかリア凸っていうか、別に銃は使わないし、対面で試合するだけだけど……こういう時に一番大事なのは、何よりも勢い！
DataList.TextTh: แน่นอนน่ะสิ! หัวใจสำคัญของเรียล PK ก็คือจำนวนคนที่ไปชิงลงมือยังไงล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 那當然！在現實PK中，最重要的莫過於先壓制住對方！
DataList.TextEn: Of course! Intimidating the opponent is everything!
DataList.TextDe: Of course! Intimidating the opponent is everything!
DataList.TextFr: Of course! Intimidating the opponent is everything!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;00;어차피 상대는 게임밖에 모르는 너드일 게 분명하니까, 여럿이 떼를 지어 몰려가면 지레 겁을 먹고 먼저 사과할 거야!
DataList.TextJp: どうせ相手はゲームしてばっかりのオタクに違いないから、みんなで行けば怯えてすぐに謝ってくるはず！
DataList.TextTh: ถึงยังไงคู่ต่อสู้ก็คงจะเป็นเด็กเนิร์ดที่รู้จักแต่เกมแน่ๆ เพราะงั้นถ้ารวมกันไปหลายๆ คนล่ะก็ #nเจ้านั่นคงจะกลัวแล้วยอมขอโทษก่อนแน่!
DataList.TextTw: 反正對方肯定是除了遊戲一無所知的阿宅，只要一群人去堵他，一定馬上就嚇得道歉了！
DataList.TextEn: I'm a hundred percent sure that we're dealing with a video game nerd, so if we show up in a big group, they'll get scared and apologize!
DataList.TextDe: I'm a hundred percent sure that we're dealing with a video game nerd, so if we show up in a big group, they'll get scared and apologize!
DataList.TextFr: I'm a hundred percent sure that we're dealing with a video game nerd, so if we show up in a big group, they'll get scared and apologize!

DataList.TextJp: 前半部分については、こっちも同じだと思うけど……。
DataList.TextTh: เรื่องนั้นทางเราก็เหมือนกันไม่ใช่เหรอ...
DataList.TextEn: Aren't we just as nerdy as they are, though...?
DataList.TextDe: Aren't we just as nerdy as they are, though...?
DataList.TextFr: Aren't we just as nerdy as they are, though...?

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미도리;02;언니, 이렇게까지 화를 낼 필요가 있는 거야? 고작 게임에서 지고 놀림을 받은 것 뿐이잖아.
#5;em;[반응]
#5;al
DataList.TextJp: ねえお姉ちゃん、たかが一回ゲームでからかわれただけで、ここまでする必要ある……？
DataList.TextTh: พี่~ ต้องโมโหอะไรเบอร์นี้ด้วยเหรอ? มันก็แค่เล่นเกมแพ้แล้วถูกล้อแค่นั้นเองนี่นา
DataList.TextTw: 姐姐，有必要發這麼大的火嗎？只是遊戲玩輸了被嘲笑一下而已啊。
DataList.TextEn: Do you really have to get so worked up, Sis? It's only a game. You lost and they trash talked you. That's all.
DataList.TextDe: Do you really have to get so worked up, Sis? It's only a game. You lost and they trash talked you. That's all.
DataList.TextFr: Do you really have to get so worked up, Sis? It's only a game. You lost and they trash talked you. That's all.

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;05;고작 게임이라니! 이건 게임개발부의 자존심이 걸린 일이라고!
#3;hophop
DataList.TextJp: 「たかが」じゃないよ！これはゲーム開発部としてのプライドに関わる大事件！
DataList.TextTh: ไม่ใช่แค่เกมสักหน่อย! นี่เป็นเรื่องศักดิ์ศรีของชมรมพัฒนาเกมต่างหาก!
DataList.TextTw: 說什麼只不過是遊戲！這可是賭上遊戲開發部自尊心的事！
DataList.TextEn: Just a game?! This is a matter of the Game Development Department's dignity!
DataList.TextDe: Just a game?! This is a matter of the Game Development Department's dignity!
DataList.TextFr: Just a game?! This is a matter of the Game Development Department's dignity!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;07;그 녀석은 내가 먼저 건넨 호의를 짓밟았을 뿐만 아니라, 나를 할머니라고 불렀어!
#1;dl
#5;dr
DataList.TextJp: 私がせっかく優しい言葉をかけたのにあんな言い方をするわ、私のことを「おばあちゃん」呼ばわりするわ……！
DataList.TextTh: เจ้านั่นไม่ได้เหยียบย่ำความเป็นมิตรที่ฉันหยิบยื่นให้ แต่ยังเรียกฉันว่าคุณยายด้วยนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 但那傢伙不只踐踏我主動釋出的善意，還叫我老奶奶！
DataList.TextEn: That guy not only trampled over my gesture of sportsmanship, but also called me a granny!
DataList.TextDe: That guy not only trampled over my gesture of sportsmanship, but also called me a granny!
DataList.TextFr: That guy not only trampled over my gesture of sportsmanship, but also called me a granny!

DataList.TextJp: 絶対に……
DataList.TextTh: คุณยายงั้นเหรอ...

DataList.TextJp: 絶対に許せない！
DataList.TextTh: ยกโทษให้ไม่ได้เด็ดขาด!

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미도리;03;……게임에서 진 것보다 할머니라고 불린 것 때문에 화가 난 거 아냐?
#5;em;[반응]
#5;al
#3;m1
DataList.TextJp: 後者の方が本音っぽいけど……。
DataList.TextTh: ถ้างั้นพี่ก็โมโหที่ถูกเรียกว่ายายมากกว่าเรื่องแพ้ในเกมใช่ไหมล่ะ?
DataList.TextTw: …比起在遊戲中輸掉，被叫老奶奶更讓人火大吧？
DataList.TextEn: Are you more mad about being called a granny than losing the match?
DataList.TextDe: Are you more mad about being called a granny than losing the match?
DataList.TextFr: Are you more mad about being called a granny than losing the match?

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;07;게다가 이런 매너 없는 게이머들은 대전 게임 환경에 조금도 도움이 되지 않아.
#3;em;[속상함]
#3;stiff
DataList.TextJp: そもそも、ああいうマナーのなってないゲーマーを放置するわけにはいかない。
DataList.TextTh: นอกจากนั้นสำหรับพวกเกมเมอร์มารยาทแย่พวกนี้น่ะ #nมักจะได้เปรียบเพราะสภาพแวดล้อมการแข่งขันด้วยนะ
DataList.TextTw: 而且這種無禮的玩家對於對戰遊戲環境也一點幫助都沒有。
DataList.TextEn: Actually, toxic players are a bad influence on the fighting game scene.
DataList.TextDe: Actually, toxic players are a bad influence on the fighting game scene.
DataList.TextFr: Actually, toxic players are a bad influence on the fighting game scene.

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;07;게임을 할 때마다 이런 불쾌한 일을 계속 당하게 된다면, 누가 대전 게임을 하려 하겠어?
DataList.TextJp: あんなユーザーがいると、この界隈に入ったばっかりの人とかが不快な思いをして、どんどん廃れていっちゃうでしょ？
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าเล่นเกมต่อสู้แล้วเจอเรื่องไม่สบอารมณ์แบบนี้ทุกครั้งใครจะอยากเล่นเกมต่อสู้กันอีกล่ะ?
DataList.TextTw: 要是每次玩遊戲都遇到這種讓人不爽的事情，誰還會想繼續玩對戰遊戲？
DataList.TextEn: If this kind of unpleasant experience becomes the norm every time someone plays a fighting game, who will ever play them?
DataList.TextDe: If this kind of unpleasant experience becomes the norm every time someone plays a fighting game, who will ever play them?
DataList.TextFr: If this kind of unpleasant experience becomes the norm every time someone plays a fighting game, who will ever play them?

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;07;깨끗한 게임 환경을 위해서라도 이런 비매너 유저는 단단히 혼을 내줘야 해!
DataList.TextJp: 良い環境作りのためにも、ああいうマナーの悪いユーザーにはしっかりお仕置きしないと！
DataList.TextTh: ต้องสั่งสอนเจ้าพวกเกมเมอร์มารยาทแย่พวกนี้ให้รู้สำนึกเพื่อสร้างสภาพแวดล้อม #nการเล่นเกมที่ดีขึ้นยังไงล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 為了維持良好的遊戲環境，得好好教訓這種無禮用戶一頓才行！
DataList.TextEn: For the sake of a clean gaming environment, we must teach this toxic player a lesson!
DataList.TextDe: For the sake of a clean gaming environment, we must teach this toxic player a lesson!
DataList.TextFr: For the sake of a clean gaming environment, we must teach this toxic player a lesson!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;07
5;아리스;05;그렇습니다. 아리스도 어제 시작한 온라인 RPG에서 만렙 유저에게 PK를 당했을 때는 게임을 그만두고 싶을 정도로 낙심했었습니다…….
#5;greeting
DataList.TextJp: それはその通りだと思います。アリスも昨日始めたオンラインRPGで、レベルMAXのユーザ[ruby=プレイヤーキル]ーにPKされ[/ruby]た時にはもうプレイをやめようかと思いました……。
DataList.TextTh: ใช่แล้วค่ะ เมื่อวานอาริสึเพิ่งเริ่มเล่นเกม RPG ออนไลน์เอง แล้วก็ถูกผู้เล่นที่เลเวลตันแล้ว #nมา PK ก็รู้สึกท้อจนอยากเลิกเล่นเลยค่ะ....
DataList.TextTw: 沒錯。雅麗絲昨天在剛開始玩的線上RPG裡被滿等用戶PK時也是，沮喪到幾乎就要棄坑了…
DataList.TextEn: I agree. When I was playing an MMORPG a few days ago, my character got killed by a max-level player. It was so painful that I just wanted to quit the game completely...
DataList.TextDe: I agree. When I was playing an MMORPG a few days ago, my character got killed by a max-level player. It was so painful that I just wanted to quit the game completely...
DataList.TextFr: I agree. When I was playing an MMORPG a few days ago, my character got killed by a max-level player. It was so painful that I just wanted to quit the game completely...

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;07
5;아리스;07;물론 하루 만에 레벨을 따라잡아 바로 복수를 해주었지만요!
#5;em;[반짝]
DataList.TextJp: もちろん、一日でそのレベルまで追いついて、すぐに仕返しをしましたが！
DataList.TextTh: แน่นอนว่าฉันก็อัปเลเวลจนเลเวลตันแล้วก็ไปแก้แค้นในทันทีเลยค่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 不過當然，他的等級在一天之內就追上來，而且還報仇了！
DataList.TextEn: But since then, I caught up to their level and have already had my revenge!
DataList.TextDe: But since then, I caught up to their level and have already had my revenge!
DataList.TextFr: But since then, I caught up to their level and have already had my revenge!

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;유즈;08;하루 만에 만렙을 찍다니…… 그 집념이 무서워…….
#5;stiff
DataList.TextJp: 一日にレベルをMAXに……すごい執念だね……。
DataList.TextTh: อัปเลเวลจนเลเวลตันได้ในวันเดียวเหรอ... เด็กคนนี้น่ากลัวจริงๆ...
DataList.TextTw: 居然在一天之內就練到滿等……她那股執念還真是可怕……
DataList.TextEn: You've already reached max level? Seriously, your obsessiveness scares me sometimes...
DataList.TextDe: You've already reached max level? Seriously, your obsessiveness scares me sometimes...
DataList.TextFr: You've already reached max level? Seriously, your obsessiveness scares me sometimes...

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미도리;02;게다가 언니도 가끔 게임에서 이기면 상대를 도발하기도 하잖아?
#5;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: それにお姉ちゃんだって時々、ゲームで勝って相手を挑発したりするでしょ？
DataList.TextTh: อีกอย่างบางครั้งเวลาที่พี่ชนะพี่ก็ชอบยั่วโมโหฝ่ายตรงข้ามเหมือนกันไม่ใช่เหรอ?
DataList.TextTw: 而且姐姐有時候打贏了，不是也會嗆對手嗎？
DataList.TextEn: But don't you taunt the opponent sometimes when you win, Sis?
DataList.TextDe: But don't you taunt the opponent sometimes when you win, Sis?
DataList.TextFr: But don't you taunt the opponent sometimes when you win, Sis?

DataList.ScriptKr: 5;미도리;00;어제도 후루젤리 대전이 끝나자마자 ‘발로 싸워도 이기겠다’며 나를 도발했으면서…….
DataList.TextJp: この間だって、私と『フルゼリー』やってた時に「これなら足で操作しても勝てる」って言ってたし……。
DataList.TextTh: เมื่อวานพอเล่นเกมฟุรุเจลลี่จบ พี่ก็พูดยั่วโมโหฉันว่า "ใช้เท้าเล่นก็ชนะได้เหมือนกัน" #nเลยไม่ใช่รึไง....
DataList.TextTw: 昨天也是，一玩完呼嚕傑利之後就嗆我說「用腳玩都能贏」…
DataList.TextEn: As soon as you finished a game of Fruitjellies with me, you taunted me! You said, "I could beat you using my feet"!
DataList.TextDe: As soon as you finished a game of Fruitjellies with me, you taunted me! You said, "I could beat you using my feet"!
DataList.TextFr: As soon as you finished a game of Fruitjellies with me, you taunted me! You said, "I could beat you using my feet"!

DataList.TextJp: うっ、それは……だってその……。
DataList.TextTh: อึ่ก! คือว่า... เรื่องนั้นมัน....

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;05;아, 아는 사람은 상관없잖아! 처음 보는 사람에게 막말을 하는 게 훨씬 더 무례한 일이라고!
#3;hophop
#3;m3
#5;dr
DataList.TextJp: み、身内はセーフ！会ったこともない人を相手に暴言を吐くのはダメ！
DataList.TextTh: ถะ... ถ้าเป็นคนรู้จักก็ไม่เป็นไรหรอกนี่นา! แต่มาพูดแย่ๆ กับคนที่เพิ่งเคยเจอกันแบบนี้น่ะ #nมันเกินไปนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 反、反正是認識的人，沒有關係！對初次見面的人亂講話才是更失禮的行為！
DataList.TextEn: It's okay to trash-talk people you know! It's much more rude to say things like that to total strangers.
DataList.TextDe: It's okay to trash-talk people you know! It's much more rude to say things like that to total strangers.
DataList.TextFr: It's okay to trash-talk people you know! It's much more rude to say things like that to total strangers.

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;00;여하튼! 상대의 대전 기록을 검색해보니 10분 전에 근처의 게임센터에서 접속한 기록이 발견되었어.
#5;hide
DataList.TextJp: と、とにかく！相手の対戦記録を検索してみたら、10分前に近所のゲーセンに接続した記録が見つかったから……
DataList.TextTh: ยังไงก็เถอะ! พอดูประวัติการแข่งของฝ่ายตรงข้ามแล้วก็เจอว่าเข้าเล่นจากเกมเซ็นเตอร์ใกล้ๆ นี้ #nเมื่อ 10 นาทีก่อนน่ะ
DataList.TextTw: 總之！搜尋對方的對戰紀錄後，發現了他10分鐘前在附近遊戲中心的連線記錄。
DataList.TextEn: Whatever! Anyway, when I searched this person's match history, I found out that they logged in ten minutes ago from the nearby game center.
DataList.TextDe: Whatever! Anyway, when I searched this person's match history, I found out that they logged in ten minutes ago from the nearby game center.
DataList.TextFr: Whatever! Anyway, when I searched this person's match history, I found out that they logged in ten minutes ago from the nearby game center.

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;01;그러니까 지금 바로 그 게임센터로 가면 그 괘씸한 비매너 유저를 찾아낼 수 있을 거야. 가서 아까의 일에 대한 사과를 받아내자고!
DataList.TextJp: 今すぐそのゲーセンに行けば、あのユーザーが見つかるはず。ちゃんとあのことについて、謝ってもらわないと！
DataList.TextTh: เพราะงั้นถ้าเราไปที่เกมเซ็นเตอร์ตอนนี้ก็จะเจอเจ้าเกมเมอร์มารยาทแย่คนนั้นได้นะ #nรีบไปหาตัวให้เจอแล้วให้เจ้านั่นขอโทษกับเรื่องที่เกิดขึ้นเถอะ!
DataList.TextTw: 所以現在直接進入遊戲中心的話，就可以找出那個可惡的無禮用戶。去叫他為剛剛的事道歉！
DataList.TextEn: Which means that we can find them if we head over there right away. Let's track them down and get them to apologize for what they said!
DataList.TextDe: Which means that we can find them if we head over there right away. Let's track them down and get them to apologize for what they said!
DataList.TextFr: Which means that we can find them if we head over there right away. Let's track them down and get them to apologize for what they said!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;미도리;00;게임센터라면 마침 나도 볼 일이 있었으니까…… 같이 가는 것 정도라면 상관없어.
#3;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: うーん、まあ私もちょうどゲーセンに用事あったし……一緒に行くのは全然良いけど。
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าเป็นเกมเซ็นเตอร์ล่ะก็... ฉันจะแวะไปอยู่พอดีเลย ถ้างั้นจะไปด้วยก็ได้
DataList.TextTw: 如果是遊戲中心的話，我也有事要去一下…可以一起去沒關係。
DataList.TextEn: I happen to have some business at the game center myself... I guess I wouldn't mind joining you.
DataList.TextDe: I happen to have some business at the game center myself... I guess I wouldn't mind joining you.
DataList.TextFr: I happen to have some business at the game center myself... I guess I wouldn't mind joining you.

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;아리스;07;사악한 마왕군 간부를 잡으러 떠나는 여행이군요. 4인 레이드입니다!
#3;em;[반짝]
#3;greeting
DataList.TextJp: 邪悪な魔王を倒しに行くんですね、いざ四人レイドへ！
DataList.TextTh: เราจะออกเดินทางเพื่อไปจับจอมมารผู้ชั่วร้ายสินะคะ ปาร์ตี้ลงดันเจี้ยนแบบสี่คน!
DataList.TextTw: 原來你們正準備要去討伐邪惡魔王軍的幹部。是四人RAID！
DataList.TextEn: It's like a quest to defeat the general of an evil lord! A four-player raid!
DataList.TextDe: It's like a quest to defeat the general of an evil lord! A four-player raid!
DataList.TextFr: It's like a quest to defeat the general of an evil lord! A four-player raid!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;유즈;02;저…… 나는 게임센터에 볼 일도 없고, 싸우고 싶지도 않은데…….
#3;stiff
DataList.TextJp: えっと、わたしはゲーセンに用事もないし、喧嘩もしたくないんだけど……。
DataList.TextTh: เอ่อ... ฉันไม่มีธุระอะไรที่เกมเซ็นเตอร์ แล้วก็ไม่ได้อยากทะเลาะกับใคร...
DataList.TextTw: 那個……我對遊樂中心不感興趣，而且我也不想戰鬥……
DataList.TextEn: Uh...I don't have any business at the game center, and I don't wanna get in a fight, either...
DataList.TextDe: Uh...I don't have any business at the game center, and I don't wanna get in a fight, either...
DataList.TextFr: Uh...I don't have any business at the game center, and I don't wanna get in a fight, either...

DataList.TextJp: 行かなくてもいい、かな……？
DataList.TextTh: ฉันขอไม่ไปได้ไหม...?

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;모모이;05;안 돼! 이런 단체 공략에서는 한 사람, 한 사람 역할의 중요하단 말이야!
#5;em;[반응]
#5;hophop
#5;al
#3;m1
DataList.TextJp: ダメ！こういう多人数での攻略は、一人一人の役割分担が大事だから！
DataList.TextTh: ไม่ได้! การบุกจู่โจมแบบกลุ่มน่ะ หน้าที่ของแต่ละคนในกลุ่มมันสำคัญมากเลยนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 不行！在這種團體攻略中，每一個人的角色都很重要！
DataList.TextEn: No! In a group boss battle, each and every member has a critical role!
DataList.TextDe: No! In a group boss battle, each and every member has a critical role!
DataList.TextFr: No! In a group boss battle, each and every member has a critical role!

DataList.ScriptKr: 5;모모이;05;네 사람이 4면을 둘러싸야 압박 효과가 제대로 나오는 법이라고!
DataList.TextJp: 討伐戦と同じ！四人で四方を囲まないと、逃げられちゃうでしょ！
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าไปกันสี่คนเราก็จะตีวงล้อมแบบสี่ด้านได้ดีที่สุดยังไงล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 四個人要四面包圍才能達到確切的壓迫效果！
DataList.TextEn: Zone control works best when there are four players each blocking a side!
DataList.TextDe: Zone control works best when there are four players each blocking a side!
DataList.TextFr: Zone control works best when there are four players each blocking a side!

DataList.TextJp: で、でも……
DataList.TextTh: แต่ว่า...

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;모모이;00;아, 그러고보니 유즈가 기대하던 신작 콘솔이 게임센터에서 시연중이라던데…… 어떤 기능이 추가되었는지 궁금하지 않아?
#5;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: ……あ、そういえばユズが楽しみにしていたあの新しい据え置き型ゲーム機、確かゲーセンでお試し会をやってた気が……？
DataList.TextTh: อ๊ะ อีกเรื่องนึง ฉันได้ยินมาว่าเกมคอนโซลใหม่ที่ยูสึตั้งหน้าตั้งตารออยู่มีเปิดให้ทดลองเล่น #nที่เกมเซ็นเตอร์นั่นด้วยนะ... ไม่อยากรู้เหรอว่ามันเพิ่มฟังก์ชั่นอะไรมาบ้าง?
DataList.TextTw: 啊，這樣說來，柚子在等的新款遊戲機正在遊戲中心展示中…你不好奇新增了哪些功能嗎？
DataList.TextEn: Oh, yeah! The new console that Yuzu has been waiting for should be on display at the game center... Aren't you curious about what kind of new functions it has?
DataList.TextDe: Oh, yeah! The new console that Yuzu has been waiting for should be on display at the game center... Aren't you curious about what kind of new functions it has?
DataList.TextFr: Oh, yeah! The new console that Yuzu has been waiting for should be on display at the game center... Aren't you curious about what kind of new functions it has?

DataList.TextJp: え、あの新型ゲームコンソール……！？
DataList.TextTh: กะ...เกมคอนโซลใหม่...!

DataList.ScriptKr: 5;모모이;03;어차피 유즈 혼자서는 절대로 나가지 않을 거잖아. 이 기회에 같이 보고 오자. 으응~?
DataList.TextJp: ユズ一人じゃ、絶対行かないでしょ？せっかくの機会だし、一緒に見に行こ？ね？
DataList.TextTh: เพราะยังไงยูสึก็ไม่ชอบออกไปข้างนอกคนเดียวอยู่แล้วนี่นา #nเพราะงั้นก็ออกไปพร้อมกับเราเลยสิ หือ~?
DataList.TextTw: 反正柚子一個人是絕對不會出去的。趁這個機會一起去看看吧。呃嗯～？
DataList.TextEn: You never go out on your own anyway. Let's take this opportunity to go see it together. What do you say?
DataList.TextDe: You never go out on your own anyway. Let's take this opportunity to go see it together. What do you say?
DataList.TextFr: You never go out on your own anyway. Let's take this opportunity to go see it together. What do you say?

DataList.TextJp: う、うぅ……分かった。
DataList.TextTh: อะ...อื้ม เข้าใจแล้ว

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;유즈;00;그럼 나는 끼어들지 않고 지켜보고만 있을 테니까…….
DataList.TextJp: わ、わたしは、介入しないで、遠くから見守ってるから……。
DataList.TextTh: ถ้างั้นฉันจะขอดูอยู่ห่างๆ ไม่เข้าไปยุ่งก็แล้วกัน...
DataList.TextTw: 那麼我就在一旁觀看，不多管閒事了……
DataList.TextEn: But I won't get involved. I'll just watch from behind.
DataList.TextDe: But I won't get involved. I'll just watch from behind.
DataList.TextFr: But I won't get involved. I'll just watch from behind.

DataList.TextJp: うん、それでも十分！
DataList.TextTh: เท่านั้นก็พอแล้วล่ะ!

DataList.TextJp: パンパカパーン！四人パーティーが結成されました！
DataList.TextTh: แต่นแตนแต๊น! จับคู่ปาร์ตี้ 4 คนเรียบร้อยแล้วค่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 叭叭叭！四人派對完成了！
DataList.TextEn: Ta-da! A four-player party has been formed!
DataList.TextDe: Ta-da! A four-player party has been formed!
DataList.TextFr: Ta-da! A four-player party has been formed!

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;모모이;00;좋아, 그럼 지금부터 괘씸한 그 게이머를 응징하러 가자!
#5;em;[!]
#5;hophop
#5;closeup
DataList.TextJp: よし！じゃあ今から、あのゲーマーを懲らしめに行こっか！
DataList.TextTh: ดีจัง ตอนนี้เราก็รีบไปสั่งสอนเจ้าเกมเมอร์มารยาทแย่นั่นกันเถอะ!
DataList.TextTw: 好，那現在就去嚴懲那個可惡的玩家吧！
DataList.TextEn: All right, let's go teach that insolent troll a lesson!
DataList.TextDe: All right, let's go teach that insolent troll a lesson!
DataList.TextFr: All right, let's go teach that insolent troll a lesson!

DataList.TextJp: ゲームの道はマナーから（２）
DataList.TextTh: มารยาทที่ดีจะช่วยสร้างสรรค์เกม 2

DataList.TextJp: ミレニアム近隣・大型ゲームセンター
DataList.TextTh: เกมเซ็นเตอร์ขนาดใหญ่ใกล้ๆ โรงเรียนมิลเลเนียม
DataList.TextTw: 千年學園附近大型遊戲中心
DataList.TextEn: Large Game Center Near the Millennium School
DataList.TextDe: Large Game Center Near the Millennium School
DataList.TextFr: Large Game Center Near the Millennium School

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;미도리;02;전에 왔을 때보다 훨씬 규모가 커졌네. 그 사이 개축 공사라도 한 걸까?
#1;em;…
DataList.TextJp: 何だか、前に来た時よりもだいぶ広くなったね。改築工事でもしたのかな？
DataList.TextTh: ใหญ่ขึ้นกว่าคราวที่แล้วอีกนะเนี่ย ปรับโฉมใหม่เหรอ?
DataList.TextTw: 規模比之前來的時候更大了。這期間進行改建了嗎？
DataList.TextEn: It's much bigger than the last time we were here. Did they renovate the building or something?
DataList.TextDe: It's much bigger than the last time we were here. Did they renovate the building or something?
DataList.TextFr: It's much bigger than the last time we were here. Did they renovate the building or something?

DataList.TextJp: 確かにそうかも。あっ、『スペースキャット』の新作アーケードも入ってる！
DataList.TextTh: นั่นน่ะสิ ว้าว มีเกมตู้ <สเปซ แคท> ใหม่ล่าสุดด้วยล่ะ!
DataList.TextTw: 就是說啊，嗚哇，<太空喵利>的街機新作也引進遊樂場了！
DataList.TextEn: Seriously. Whoa, they brought in the newest Space Cat machine!
DataList.TextDe: Seriously. Whoa, they brought in the newest Space Cat machine!
DataList.TextFr: Seriously. Whoa, they brought in the newest Space Cat machine!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;아리스;01;유즈, 저기에 신작 콘솔 게임기의 시연대가 있습니다.
#3;em;[반응]
#3;a
DataList.TextJp: ユズ、あそこに新しい据え置き型ゲーム機の試遊台があります。
DataList.TextTh: ยูสึ~ นั่นไงเครื่องทดลองเล่นเกมคอนโซลใหม่ค่ะ
DataList.TextTw: 柚子在那邊的新上市遊戲主機展示台前。
DataList.TextEn: Yuzu, there's the new console display!
DataList.TextDe: Yuzu, there's the new console display!
DataList.TextFr: Yuzu, there's the new console display!

DataList.TextJp: あぁ……！ついに、第15世代ゲームコンソールの時代が……
DataList.TextTh: อ่า... ในที่สุดก็ถึงยุคของเกมคอนโซลรุ่นที่ 15...
DataList.TextTw: 啊啊……第十五代遊戲主機的時代終於……
DataList.TextEn: Whoa... Finally, the fifteenth generation of consoles is here...
DataList.TextDe: Whoa... Finally, the fifteenth generation of consoles is here...
DataList.TextFr: Whoa... Finally, the fifteenth generation of consoles is here...

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;유즈;02;어디 보자…… 측면에 새로운 방식의 냉각 장치를 부착했네. 이로써 지난 세대의 문제가 확실히 개선되었어.
#5;em;…
#5;m3
#3;dl
DataList.TextJp: えっと……あ、側面に新しい方式の冷却装置……前の問題点がちゃんと改善されてる。
DataList.TextTh: ไหนดูซิ... มีระบบระบายความร้อนแบบใหม่ที่ด้านข้างตัวเครื่อง #nปรับปรุงมาจากปัญหาที่รุ่นก่อนๆ เคยเจอสินะ
DataList.TextTw: 我看看……側面的部分裝上了新型散熱裝置，這樣前幾代的問題應該就能徹底改善了。
DataList.TextEn: Let's see... They added a new cooling mechanism on the side. That will definitely improve the problem that the previous gen had.
DataList.TextDe: Let's see... They added a new cooling mechanism on the side. That will definitely improve the problem that the previous gen had.
DataList.TextFr: Let's see... They added a new cooling mechanism on the side. That will definitely improve the problem that the previous gen had.

DataList.ScriptKr:
#5;hide
3;유즈;01;게다가 하이엔드 게이밍 메모리 덕분인지 반응 속도도 훨씬 더 빨라졌고…….
DataList.TextJp: メモリの部分も全然違うかも、反応速度がだいぶ速くなって……。
DataList.TextTh: นอกจากนี้อาจเป็นเพราะใช้เมมโมรี่เกมมิ่งระดับสูง เลยทำให้ตอบสนองได้รวดเร็วขึ้นมาก...
DataList.TextTw: 加上或許是因為有高階遊戲記憶體，反應速度也變得更快了…
DataList.TextEn: Not only that, the response rate is much faster now, thanks to this high-end gaming memory...
DataList.TextDe: Not only that, the response rate is much faster now, thanks to this high-end gaming memory...
DataList.TextFr: Not only that, the response rate is much faster now, thanks to this high-end gaming memory...

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;모모이;03;하하…… 역시 유즈는 게임에 관련된 일이라면 의욕이 넘치네.
#1;em;[음표]
#1;ar
#3;m5
DataList.TextJp: あはは……やっぱりユズはゲームに触れると人が変わったみたいになるね。
DataList.TextTh: ฮ่าฮ่า... ยูสึเนี่ย ถ้าเป็นเรื่องเกี่ยวกับเกมล่ะก็จะดูกระตือรือร้นจริงๆ เลยนะ
DataList.TextTw: 哈哈…果然只要是跟遊戲有關的事，柚子就會充滿幹勁。
DataList.TextEn: Haha... Yuzu always gets so excited about gaming stuff.
DataList.TextDe: Haha... Yuzu always gets so excited about gaming stuff.
DataList.TextFr: Haha... Yuzu always gets so excited about gaming stuff.

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미도리;00;언니, 우리도 저기에 있는 스페이스 캣을 플레이하러 가보자.
#5;em;[반응]
#5;al
#3;m3
DataList.TextJp: お姉ちゃん、私たちも『スペースキャット』やってみようよ。
DataList.TextTh: พี่คะ เราไปเล่นสเปซแคทตรงนั้นกันเถอะ
DataList.TextTw: 姐姐，我們也去玩那邊的太空喵利吧。
DataList.TextEn: Let's go play Space Cat, Sis!
DataList.TextDe: Let's go play Space Cat, Sis!
DataList.TextFr: Let's go play Space Cat, Sis!

DataList.TextJp: うんっ、じゃあ手加減無しで……
DataList.TextTh: ได้ เตรียมตัวให้ดีล่ะ เพราะฉันไม่อ่อนข้อให้แน่...
DataList.TextTw: 好。我不會手下留情，做好心理準備吧…
DataList.TextEn: Okay! But I won't go easy on you, so brace your...
DataList.TextDe: Okay! But I won't go easy on you, so brace your...
DataList.TextFr: Okay! But I won't go easy on you, so brace your...

DataList.TextJp: ……じゃなくて！こんなことしてる場合じゃないよ！
DataList.TextTh: ...ไม่สิ ไม่ใช่เวลาจะมามัวเล่นเกมสักหน่อย!
DataList.TextEn: ...Wait, this isn't what we came here for!
DataList.TextDe: ...Wait, this isn't what we came here for!
DataList.TextFr: ...Wait, this isn't what we came here for!

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;모모이;05;다들 우리가 여기에 온 목적을 잊어버린 거야? 어서 그 괘씸한 비매너 게임 유저를 찾아내야지!
#1;em;[!]
#1;hophop
#1;m3
#5;dr
#3;dr
DataList.TextJp: ここに来た目的を忘れたの？早くあのマナーのなってないゲーマーを見つけなきゃ！
DataList.TextTh: ทุกคนลืมเป้าหมายที่เรามาที่นี่แล้วรึไง? รีบไปหาตัวเกมเมอร์มารยาทแย่คนนั้นกันเถอะ!
DataList.TextTw: 大家忘了我們來這裡的目的是什麼了嗎？得快點找出那個可惡的無禮用戶啊！
DataList.TextEn: Did everyone forget why we're here? We have to find that toxic player right now!
DataList.TextDe: Did everyone forget why we're here? We have to find that toxic player right now!
DataList.TextFr: Did everyone forget why we're here? We have to find that toxic player right now!

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;미도리;02;아니, 나는 애초에 새로운 콘솔 패드를 구입하러 온 건데.
#5;al
#3;m1
DataList.TextJp: いや、そもそも私は新しいコントローラーを買いに来たんだけど……。
DataList.TextTh: เปล่าสักหน่อย ฉันมาที่นี่เพราะจะมาซื้อจอยเกมอันใหม่ต่างหาก
DataList.TextTw: 不對，我起初是為了買新的遊戲把手而來的。
DataList.TextEn: Actually, I came to buy a new controller.
DataList.TextDe: Actually, I came to buy a new controller.
DataList.TextFr: Actually, I came to buy a new controller.

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;아리스;00;모모이, 쓰러트릴 몬스터가 잔뜩 있습니다. 어떤 게임부터 할까요?
#5;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: モモイ、倒すべきモンスターがたくさんです。どのゲームからやりましょう？
DataList.TextTh: โมโมอิ~ มีมอนสเตอร์ให้กำจัดเยอะแยะเลยค่ะ เริ่มจากเกมไหนก่อนดีคะ?
DataList.TextTw: 桃井，這裡有好多怪物要消滅。要從什麼遊戲開始玩呢？
DataList.TextEn: We have a lot of monsters to slay, Momoi. Which game should be play first?
DataList.TextDe: We have a lot of monsters to slay, Momoi. Which game should be play first?
DataList.TextFr: We have a lot of monsters to slay, Momoi. Which game should be play first?

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;유즈;00;나도 싸우는 것보다는…… 새로운 게임기를 느긋하게 살펴보고 싶어…….
#5;em;…
DataList.TextJp: わたしも、喧嘩なんてしないで……ずっと新しいゲーム機を見てたい……。
DataList.TextTh: ฉันเองก็อยากมาดูเครื่องเกมใหม่... มากกว่ามาทะเลาะกัน...
DataList.TextTw: 比起戰鬥……我更喜歡悠哉地欣賞新出的遊戲機……
DataList.TextEn: I'd much rather just stay here and look at the new console than fight someone...
DataList.TextDe: I'd much rather just stay here and look at the new console than fight someone...
DataList.TextFr: I'd much rather just stay here and look at the new console than fight someone...

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;모모이;05;안 돼, 이러는 사이에도 그 유저가 또 다른 게임 유저에게 폭언을 내뱉고 있을지도 모른다고!
#3;hophop
#3;em;[!]
DataList.TextJp: ダメダメ！こうしてる間にも、あのユーザーがまたどこかで暴言を吐いているかもしれないんだよ！？
DataList.TextTh: ไม่ได้นะ ระหว่างนั้นเจ้านั่นอาจจะกำลังไปทำนิสัยแย่ๆ ใส่เกมเมอร์คนอื่นอยู่ก็ได้นะ!
DataList.TextTw: 不行，我們還在這邊磨蹭的時候，那個用戶可能又在其他遊戲裡對別人口出惡言了！
DataList.TextEn: No! Even at this very moment, that player might be trash talking others!
DataList.TextDe: No! Even at this very moment, that player might be trash talking others!
DataList.TextFr: No! Even at this very moment, that player might be trash talking others!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;모모이;05;그렇게 실망한 유저가 떠나고, 또 다른 유저가 떠나면…… 대전 게임을 하는 사람이 전부 없어질지도 몰라!
DataList.TextJp: それで落ち込んじゃったユーザーがゲームから離れて、また別のユーザーも……ってなったら、いつかは対戦型ゲームそのものが廃れちゃう！
DataList.TextTh: ถ้ามีคนที่ท้อแท้แล้วเลิกเล่นไปทีละคนล่ะก็... ผู้เล่นเกมต่อสู้อาจหายไปหมดเลยก็ได้นะ!
DataList.TextTw: 失望的用戶離開，其他用戶也陸續離開的話…總有一天會再也沒有人玩對戰遊戲了。
DataList.TextEn: If they keep doing so, and more and more people do the same...there might not be a single fighting game player left!
DataList.TextDe: If they keep doing so, and more and more people do the same...there might not be a single fighting game player left!
DataList.TextFr: If they keep doing so, and more and more people do the same...there might not be a single fighting game player left!

DataList.TextJp: それは流石に、悲観的すぎない……？
DataList.TextTh: มองโลกในแง่ร้ายเกินไปรึเปล่า?
DataList.TextTw: 這想法會不會太悲觀了？
DataList.TextEn: Aren't you being a little too pessimistic there?
DataList.TextDe: Aren't you being a little too pessimistic there?
DataList.TextFr: Aren't you being a little too pessimistic there?

DataList.TextJp: なるほど、これは世界を救うための崇高な戦い……
DataList.TextTh: นี่คือการต่อสู้ที่สูงส่งเพื่อกอบกู้โลก...
DataList.TextTw: 攸關世界存亡的崇高戰鬥……
DataList.TextEn: This is a sacred battle to save the world...
DataList.TextDe: This is a sacred battle to save the world...
DataList.TextFr: This is a sacred battle to save the world...

DataList.TextJp: 勇者たちよ、早速魔王の根城に向かうとしよう！
DataList.TextTh: เหล่านักรบเอ๋ย... รีบไปที่ฐานทัพของจอมมารกันเถอะ!
DataList.TextTw: 勇者們，請你們盡快前往魔王的大本營吧！
DataList.TextEn: Heroes, it's high time that we head to the evil lord's den!
DataList.TextDe: Heroes, it's high time that we head to the evil lord's den!
DataList.TextFr: Heroes, it's high time that we head to the evil lord's den!

DataList.TextJp: うん、とりあえず『スチューデントファイター2』があるところに行こっか！
DataList.TextTh: โอเค รีบไปที่โซนเกม <สติวเดนท์ ไฟเตอร์ 2> กันเถอะ!
DataList.TextTw: 是，快點移動到有<慢打炫風2>的區域吧！
DataList.TextEn: Right, let's hurry to the section where the Student Fighter 2 machine is!
DataList.TextDe: Right, let's hurry to the section where the Student Fighter 2 machine is!
DataList.TextFr: Right, let's hurry to the section where the Student Fighter 2 machine is!

DataList.ScriptKr:

DataList.TextJp: 思ったより人が少ないね、もしかしてもう帰っちゃったんじゃない？
DataList.TextTh: คนไม่เยอะอย่างที่คิดเลยแฮะ กลับกันไปแล้วรึเปล่านะ?
DataList.TextTw: 人比想像中來得少呢。是不是已經回去了？
DataList.TextEn: There aren't as many people here as I expected. Maybe the guy already left?
DataList.TextDe: There aren't as many people here as I expected. Maybe the guy already left?
DataList.TextFr: There aren't as many people here as I expected. Maybe the guy already left?

DataList.ScriptKr:

#1;em;[!]
#1;ar
#1;hophop
#3;m5
DataList.TextJp: ううん、まだ分からないよ。画面のIDを見てみて。
DataList.TextTh: ไม่หรอก ไม่มีทางหรอก คอยดูไอดีที่หน้าจอให้ดีๆ แล้วกัน
DataList.TextTw: 不，不可能。仔細查看，確認畫面上的ID。

DataList.TextDe: No, there's no way. Check the IDs on the screens.
DataList.TextFr: No, there's no way. Check the IDs on the screens.

DataList.TextJp: このユーザーは違う……
DataList.TextTh: ไม่ใช่คนนี้...

DataList.TextJp: こっちも違う……。
DataList.TextTh: คนนี้ก็ไม่ใช่...

DataList.TextJp: いやっほーぅ、また勝った！連戦連勝ぉ！
DataList.TextTh: ยะฮู่ว! ชนะอีกแล้ว! ชนะต่อเนื่องเลย!
DataList.TextEn: Yahoo, another win! I'm on a winning streak!
DataList.TextDe: Yahoo, another win! I'm on a winning streak!
DataList.TextFr: Yahoo, another win! I'm on a winning streak!

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;패배한 게이머;00;으으, 또 졌어…… 모처럼 비장의 기술까지 사용했는데…….
#5;em;[속상함]
#5;stiff
#5;a
#3;m1
DataList.TextJp: うぅ、また負けた……せっかく練習したのに……。
DataList.TextTh: ฮือ... แพ้อีกแล้ว ทั้งที่ใช้ท่าไม้ตายลับแล้วแท้ๆ...
DataList.TextTw: 呃呃，又輸了……我可是連終極武器都用上了耶……
DataList.TextEn: Ugh, I lost again...even though I used my secret move!
DataList.TextDe: Ugh, I lost again...even though I used my secret move!
DataList.TextFr: Ugh, I lost again...even though I used my secret move!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;악질 게이머;01;방금 보여준 그 허접한 연계기가 비장의 기술이었다고? 진심이야?
DataList.TextJp: 練習って、あの「偶然出た」みたいな連携技っぽいやつ？それ本気で言ってんの？
DataList.TextTh: ท่าที่ใช้เมื่อกี้คือท่าไม้ตายลับงั้นเหรอ? ถามจริง?
DataList.TextTw: 剛才那個無聊連體技就是你所謂的秘密武器？你是認真的嗎？
DataList.TextEn: You mean that clunky combo was your secret move? Are you serious?
DataList.TextDe: You mean that clunky combo was your secret move? Are you serious?
DataList.TextFr: You mean that clunky combo was your secret move? Are you serious?

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;악질 게이머;03;우리 할머니가 그것보다는 더 잘하겠다! 크크크…… 푸훗!
#3;em;[재잘]
DataList.TextJp: これなら足で操作したって勝てそうだよ！くくっ、あははっ！！
DataList.TextTh: ยายของฉันยังเล่นได้เก่งกว่านั้นเลยนะ! ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า... พรืดดดดด!
DataList.TextTw: 我叫我奶奶來玩都比你厲害！咳咳咳……噗哈！
DataList.TextEn: My grandma is better than you!
DataList.TextDe: My grandma is better than you!
DataList.TextFr: My grandma is better than you!

DataList.ScriptKr:
5;패배한 게이머;00;뭐? 아무리 게임이라지만 어떻게 그렇게 심한 말을 할 수가 있어?
#5;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: ちょっ、ゲームでそこまで言わなくてもいいじゃん！
DataList.TextTh: ว่ายังไงนะ? ถึงจะแค่เล่นเกมก็เถอะ แต่พูดแบบนั้นได้ยังไงกัน?
DataList.TextTw: 什麼？就算是在玩遊戲，你也不能說那麼難聽的話吧？
DataList.TextEn: What? It's just a game! You can't say stuff like that!
DataList.TextDe: What? It's just a game! You can't say stuff like that!
DataList.TextFr: What? It's just a game! You can't say stuff like that!

DataList.TextJp: 今言ったこと、取り消して！
DataList.TextTh: ขอโทษมาเดี๋ยวนี้เลยนะ!
DataList.TextTw: 立刻取消你剛才說的那句話！

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;악질 게이머;03;싫거든? 바보, 바보~ 게임도 제대로 못하는 바보~
#3;em;[음표]
DataList.TextJp: ヤダよバ～カ、ゲームもできないのに何ができるの？楽しいことでも頑張れないのに、他の何なら頑張れるわけ？勉強？スポーツ？恋愛？
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าไม่ขอโทษจะทำไม? เจ้าทึ่ม~ เจ้าทึ่ม~ เจ้าทึ่มที่เล่นเกมได้ห่วยสุดๆ~
DataList.TextTw: 我才不要？笨蛋，笨蛋～連遊戲都不會玩的笨蛋～
DataList.TextEn: Why should I? You're a moron who can't even play the game right!
DataList.TextDe: Why should I? You're a moron who can't even play the game right!
DataList.TextFr: Why should I? You're a moron who can't even play the game right!

DataList.TextJp: うぅ……ママに言いつけてやるっ！
DataList.TextTh: ฉะ... ฉันจะไปฟ้องแม่!
DataList.TextEn: Ugh. I'm gonna tell my mom!
DataList.TextDe: Ugh. I'm gonna tell my mom!
DataList.TextFr: Ugh. I'm gonna tell my mom!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;미도리;02;우와, 심하네. 현실에서도 저런 폭언을 내뱉는 게이머가 있다니.
#3;em;[땀]
#3;stiff
#3;a
DataList.TextJp: うわ、ひっどいね。オフラインでもあんな暴言を吐くゲーマーがいるなんて。
DataList.TextTh: โห... ใจร้ายจัง มีเกมเมอร์ที่พูดจาร้ายกาจแบบนี้ใส่กันอยู่ด้วยแฮะ
DataList.TextTw: 嗚哇，好嚴重。竟然有這種連在現實中也口出惡言的玩家。
DataList.TextEn: Yikes...I can't believe that there's a player out there who'd trash talk in real life like that.
DataList.TextDe: Yikes...I can't believe that there's a player out there who'd trash talk in real life like that.
DataList.TextFr: Yikes...I can't believe that there's a player out there who'd trash talk in real life like that.

DataList.ScriptKr:
2;모모이;05;아앗, 찾았다! 그 때 보았던 그 ID야!

#2;ar
#3;m4
DataList.TextJp: ああっ、見つけた！あのID！

DataList.TextTw: 啊啊，找到了！是當時看過的那個ID！
DataList.TextEn: I found it! The same ID I saw earlier!
DataList.TextDe: I found it! The same ID I saw earlier!
DataList.TextFr: I found it! The same ID I saw earlier!

3;악질 게이머;00;으응? 뭐야, 너희들도 내게 도전할 셈이야?
#3;em;[?]

DataList.TextJp: ん？何だ、お前たちもあたしに挑戦するつもりか？
DataList.TextTh: หือ? อะไร พวกเธอคิดจะมาท้าแข่งกับฉันเหรอ?
DataList.TextTw: 呃嗯？幹嘛，你們也想要挑戰我嗎？
DataList.TextEn: Hmm? What, you guys want to challenge me too?
DataList.TextDe: Hmm? What, you guys want to challenge me too?
DataList.TextFr: Hmm? What, you guys want to challenge me too?

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;모모이;05;너, Sukeban312 맞지? 어제 온라인 대전으로 나를 할머니라고 불렀던 그 녀석!
#1;em;[!]
DataList.TextJp: あんた、「Sukeban312」だよね？昨日オンライン対戦で、私のことを「おばあちゃん」って言ったでしょ！
DataList.TextTh: เธอคือ Sukeban312 ใช่ไหม? เมื่อวานตอนแข่งกันเธอเรียกฉันว่าคุณยาย!
DataList.TextTw: 你是Sukeban312吧？昨天線上對戰那個叫我老奶奶的傢伙！
DataList.TextEn: You're Sukeban312, right? You're the one who called me a granny online!
DataList.TextDe: You're Sukeban312, right? You're the one who called me a granny online!
DataList.TextFr: You're Sukeban312, right? You're the one who called me a granny online!

DataList.TextJp: ってことは……お前が「Peach_Figther」？
DataList.TextTh: ถ้างั้น... เธอคือ Peach_Figther งั้นเหรอ?

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;악질 게이머;03;하하, 뭐야. 예상한 대로 역시 꼬맹이였잖아?
DataList.TextJp: ははっ、なんだ、予想通りやっぱりガキじゃん。
DataList.TextTh: ฮ่าฮ่า อะไรกันเนี่ย เป็นเด็กตัวกะเปี๊ยกเหมือนที่คิดเลยนะ?
DataList.TextTw: 哈哈，搞什麼啊，你果然跟我猜得一樣是個小鬼嘛！
DataList.TextEn: Haha, look at you. You're just as wimpy as I expected.
DataList.TextDe: Haha, look at you. You're just as wimpy as I expected.
DataList.TextFr: Haha, look at you. You're just as wimpy as I expected.

DataList.TextJp: が、ガキじゃないし！？
DataList.TextTh: ว่ายังไงนะ~?!

DataList.ScriptKr: 1;미도리;07;정말 무례한 사람이네. 만나서도 그런 말을 계속하다니…….
DataList.TextJp: 対面でもこれって、本当に失礼な人……。
DataList.TextTh: เป็นคนหยาบคายจริงๆ พอเจอกันแล้วก็ยังพูดแบบนั้นอีก...
DataList.TextTw: 真是沒禮貌的人。就算見了面還是一直說這種話…
DataList.TextEn: You're so rude! I can't believe you're still saying that stuff face-to-face.
DataList.TextDe: You're so rude! I can't believe you're still saying that stuff face-to-face.
DataList.TextFr: You're so rude! I can't believe you're still saying that stuff face-to-face.

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;아리스;05;모모이, 빛의 검으로 이 사악한 마인을 정화하도록 버리죠!
#1;em;[반응]
DataList.TextJp: ……モモイ。[ruby=スーパーノヴァ]「光の剣」[/ruby]でこの邪悪な魔王、浄化しますか？
DataList.TextTh: โมโมอิ~ ใช้ดาบแห่งแสงชำระล้างเจ้าคนชั่วร้ายนี้เถอะ!
DataList.TextTw: 桃井，快用光劍淨化那隻邪惡的魔物！
DataList.TextEn: Momoi, let us cleanse this evildoer with the Sword of Light!
DataList.TextDe: Momoi, let us cleanse this evildoer with the Sword of Light!
DataList.TextFr: Momoi, let us cleanse this evildoer with the Sword of Light!

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;모모이;05;당장 어제의 폭언에 대해 사과하지 않으면 뜨거운 맛을 보게 해 주겠어! 당장 사과해!
#1;hophop
DataList.TextJp: 昨日の暴言について今すぐ謝らないと、痛い目にあうよ！早く謝って！
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าไม่ขอโทษที่พูดจาหยาบคายใส่ฉันล่ะก็ได้เห็นดีกันแน่! ขอโทษมาเดี๋ยวนี้นะ!
DataList.TextTw: 不馬上為昨天的惡言道歉的話，我會讓你嚐到痛苦的滋味！馬上道歉！
DataList.TextEn: If you don't apologize for your abusive language, I will show you hell! Apologize, right now!
DataList.TextDe: If you don't apologize for your abusive language, I will show you hell! Apologize, right now!
DataList.TextFr: If you don't apologize for your abusive language, I will show you hell! Apologize, right now!

DataList.TextJp: やーだよーだ。
DataList.TextTh: ไม่เอา

DataList.TextJp: 何でっ！
DataList.TextTh: เธอนี่มัน...!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;악질 게이머;99;나는 나보다 약한 상대에게 사과를 하지 않아.
DataList.TextJp: あたしは、自分より弱い相手なんかには謝らない。
DataList.TextTh: ฉันไม่ขอโทษคนที่อ่อนแอกว่าฉันหรอก
DataList.TextTw: 我從來不向比我弱的人道歉，
DataList.TextEn: I don't apologize to people weaker than me.
DataList.TextDe: I don't apologize to people weaker than me.
DataList.TextFr: I don't apologize to people weaker than me.

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;악질 게이머;00;나보다 게임도 못하는 사람에게 머리를 숙이는 건 자존심 상하는 일이잖아?
#3;m3
#3;em;[음표]
#1;dl
DataList.TextJp: どうして自分より下手な人に頭を下げなきゃいけないわけ？意味もなくプライドが傷つくじゃん。
DataList.TextTh: ถ้าต้องก้มหัวให้กับคนที่เล่นเกมห่วยกว่าฉันล่ะก็เสียศักดิ์ศรีพอดีกันน่ะสิ?
DataList.TextTw: 向玩遊戲比自己弱的人低頭，你不覺得很傷自尊心嗎？
DataList.TextEn: It would hurt my pride to bow to an inferior player.
DataList.TextDe: It would hurt my pride to bow to an inferior player.
DataList.TextFr: It would hurt my pride to bow to an inferior player.

DataList.TextJp: こんっの……！
DataList.TextTh: เธอนี่มันจริงๆ เลยนะ!

DataList.TextJp: ……お姉ちゃん、撃っていい？
DataList.TextTh: พี่คะ... ยิงเลยดีไหม?

DataList.ScriptKr:
#3;hide
5;아리스;05;용사여, 저는 검을 뽑을 준비를 이미 마쳤습니다.
#5;greeting
DataList.TextJp: 勇者よ、汝が許可するのであれば、私はいつでもこ[ruby=レールガン]の剣を[/ruby]抜こう。
DataList.TextTh: เหล่านักรบเอ๋ย ฉันพร้อมที่จะกวัดแกว่งดาบแล้วล่ะ
DataList.TextTw: 勇士啊，我已經做好了拔劍的準備。
DataList.TextEn: Hero, I'm ready to draw my sword. Just say the word.
DataList.TextDe: Hero, I'm ready to draw my sword. Just say the word.
DataList.TextFr: Hero, I'm ready to draw my sword. Just say the word.

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;악질 게이머;03;후후, 그렇게 억울하다면 이 자리에서 <스튜던트 파이터 2>로 승부를 보는 게 어때? 한 판이라도 날 이긴다면 어제의 일에 대해서는 사과할게.
#3;em;[재잘]
#3;a
DataList.TextJp: はっ、そこまで言うならあらためて『スチューデントファイター2』で勝負を決めるのはどうだ？一度でも私に勝てたら、昨日のことは謝ってやるよ。
DataList.TextTh: หึหึ ถ้าไม่พอใจขนาดนั้นล่ะก็ มาแข่งเกม <สติวเดนท์ ไฟเตอร์ 2> กันที่นี่เลยไหมล่ะ? #nถ้าชนะฉันได้สักตาล่ะก็ ฉันจะยอมขอโทษเรื่องเมื่อวานก็ได้
DataList.TextTw: 呵呵，如果你真的覺得那麼委屈的話，要不要和我比一場<快打颱風2>啊？如果你有辦法贏我一場的話，我就為昨天的事情向你道歉。
DataList.TextEn: Heh heh. If you think that's so unfair, then why don't we play Student Fighter 2 right now to settle the score? If you can get one round off of me, I'll apologize for what I said!
DataList.TextDe: Heh heh. If you think that's so unfair, then why don't we play Student Fighter 2 right now to settle the score? If you can get one round off of me, I'll apologize for what I said!
DataList.TextFr: Heh heh. If you think that's so unfair, then why don't we play Student Fighter 2 right now to settle the score? If you can get one round off of me, I'll apologize for what I said!

DataList.TextJp: 言ったね、よしっ。今度は手加減しないんだから……！
DataList.TextTh: ได้ คราวนี้ฉันจะขยี้เธอให้แหลกเลย!
DataList.TextTw: 好。我這次不會手下留情的…
DataList.TextEn: Okay, fine! But I won't go easy on you this time...
DataList.TextDe: Okay, fine! But I won't go easy on you this time...
DataList.TextFr: Okay, fine! But I won't go easy on you this time...

DataList.ScriptKr:
1;모모이;05;미리 머리 박고 사죄할 준비나 하고 있으라고!
#1;em;[!]
DataList.TextJp: 謝罪の言葉でも考えておいた方が良いよ！
DataList.TextTh: เตรียมตัวเตรียมใจก้มหัวขอโทษฉันเอาไว้ได้เลย!
DataList.TextTw: 你做好低頭謝罪的準備吧！
DataList.TextEn: Get ready to get on your knees and apologize!
DataList.TextDe: Get ready to get on your knees and apologize!
DataList.TextFr: Get ready to get on your knees and apologize!

DataList.TextJp: んじゃ……
DataList.TextTh: ถ้างั้นก็...

DataList.TextJp: 勝負！
DataList.TextTh: มาแข่งกันเลย!

DataList.TextJp: <SYSTEM> 「Sukeban312」選手の勝利！
DataList.TextTh: <ข้อความระบบ> ผู้เล่น Sukeban312 ชนะ!

DataList.ScriptKr:
3;악질 게이머;03;풋! 뭐야, 자신만만하게 나선 주제에 또 졌잖아?
#3;em;[재잘]
#3;a
DataList.TextJp: ふはっ、何だよ！自信満々で再挑戦しておいて、こんなもんか？
DataList.TextTh: พรืดดดด! อะไรกันน่ะ ทั้งที่ดูมั่นใจขนาดนั้นแท้ๆ แต่ทำไมถึงแพ้อีกล่ะ?
DataList.TextTw: 噗！你剛才不是還一副自信滿滿的樣子嗎？怎麼又輸了啊？
DataList.TextEn: Pfft! Wow, you lost again after talking such a big game!
DataList.TextDe: Pfft! Wow, you lost again after talking such a big game!
DataList.TextFr: Pfft! Wow, you lost again after talking such a big game!

DataList.ScriptKr: 3;악질 게이머;03;너 정말 게임에 재능 없는 거 아니야? 크크…….
DataList.TextJp: お前、本当にゲームの才能無いんじゃない？くくっ……！
DataList.TextTh: ไม่มีพรสวรรค์ในการเล่นเกมรึเปล่าน้า? คิคิ...
DataList.TextTw: 你也太不會玩遊戲了吧？科科……

DataList.ScriptKr:
